mapper.select: SELECT * FROM (SELECT A.* , rownum AS rn FROM (SELECT b.* , u.u_nickname ,(SELECT COUNT(*) FROM comment_tbl c WHERE b.b_num = c.b_num) AS b_comments FROM user_tbl u, board_tbl b WHERE u.u_member_id = b.u_member_id ORDER BY b.b_num DESC) A ) WHERE rn BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}
SELECT b.* , u.u_nickname FROM user_tbl u, board_tbl b WHERE u.u_member_id = b.u_member_id AND b.b_num = #{b_num}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO recommend_tbl(rec_num, u_member_id, b_num) VALUES ((SELECT NVL(MAX(rec_num)+1, 1) FROM recommend_tbl), #{u_member_id}, #{b_num})
mapper.select: SELECT c.c_num, c.b_num, c.u_member_id, c.c_content, c.c_regDate, c.c_num2, c.c_deleted, c.c_writer FROM comment_tbl c WHERE c.b_num = #{b_num} ORDER BY c.c_num asc
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO comment_tbl(c_num, b_num, u_member_id, c_content, c_regDate, c_num2, c_deleted, c_writer) VALUES ((SELECT NVL(MAX(c_num)+1, 1) FROM comment_tbl), #{b_num}, #{u_member_id}, #{c_content}, sysdate, NVL(#{c_num2, jdbcType=INTEGER}, 0), NVL(#{c_deleted, jdbcType=CHAR}, 'N'), (SELECT u_nickname FROM user_tbl WHERE u_member_id = #{u_member_id}))
